content: learn how to crochet a flower potholder with this vintage inspired hot pad tutorial these easy crochet potholders are double-thick super sturdy and great to use in the kitchen free pattern with step-by-step photos at jewelsandjones com materials - 1 skein of scheepjes catona yarn in the color linen #505 fingering 4/ply 50 grams/ 136 7 yds - 2 skeins of scheepjes catona yarn in the color charcoal #393 fingering 4/ply 50 grams/ 136 7 yds - size 3 0 mm d crochet hook - darning needle - stitch markers - scissors
